mapper.sql: select report_data, time_period, pa_called_num, pa_call_len, pa_call_num, zj_called_num, zj_call_len, zj_call_num, total_called_num, total_call_len, total_call_num, user_group, login_name, user_name from t_lc_report_personal
mapper.select: select * from ( select #{date} AS report_data, su.user_group, su.login_name, su.user_name, '0-9' as time_period, MAX(t.pa_called_num) as pa_called_num, MAX(t.pa_call_len) as pa_call_len, MAX(t.pa_call_num) as pa_call_num, MAX(t.zj_called_num) as zj_called_num, MAX(t.zj_call_len) as zj_call_len, MAX(t.zj_call_num) as zj_call_num, IFNULL(MAX(t.pa_called_num),0) + IFNULL(MAX(t.zj_called_num),0) as total_called_num, IFNULL(MAX(t.pa_call_len),0) + IFNULL(MAX(t.zj_call_len),0) as total_call_len, IFNULL(MAX(t.pa_call_num),0) + IFNULL(MAX(t.zj_call_num),0) as total_call_num from( select CASE t.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN t.called_num END 'pa_called_num', CASE t.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN t.call_len END 'pa_call_len', CASE t.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN t.call_num END 'pa_call_num', CASE t.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN t.called_num END 'zj_called_num', CASE t.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN t.call_len END 'zj_call_len', CASE t.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN t.call_num END 'zj_call_num', t.create_by, t.platform from( SELECT re.platform, re.create_by, (SELECT COUNT(1) as call_num FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT(#{date},' 00:00:00') and r.create_time <= CONCAT(#{date},' 08:59:59') and r.platform = re.platform and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.platform,r.create_by) call_num, (SELECT COUNT(1) as thcs FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT(#{date},' 00:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT(#{date},' 08:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.platform = re.platform and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.platform,r.create_by ) called_num, (SELECT sum(r.call_len) / 1000 / 60 as thsc FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT(#{date},' 00:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT(#{date},' 08:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.platform = re.platform and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.platform,r.create_by ) call_len FROM t_lc_call_record re WHERE re.create_time >= CONCAT(#{date},' 00:00:00') and re.create_time <= CONCAT(#{date},' 08:59:59') GROUP BY re.platform,re.create_by ) t GROUP BY t.create_by,t.platform ) t,sys_user su where t.create_by = su.user_id and t.create_by != 1 and su.user_name = #{agentName} GROUP BY t.create_by UNION ALL select #{date} AS report_data, su.user_group, su.login_name, su.user_name, '09-10' as time_period, MAX(t.pa_called_num) as pa_called_num, MAX(t.pa_call_len) as pa_call_len, MAX(t.pa_call_num) as pa_call_num, MAX(t.zj_called_num) as zj_called_num, MAX(t.zj_call_len) as zj_call_len, MAX(t.zj_call_num) as zj_call_num, IFNULL(MAX(t.pa_called_num),0) + IFNULL(MAX(t.zj_called_num),0) as total_called_num, IFNULL(MAX(t.pa_call_len),0) + IFNULL(MAX(t.zj_call_len),0) as total_call_len, IFNULL(MAX(t.pa_call_num),0) + IFNULL(MAX(t.zj_call_num),0) as total_call_num from( select CASE t.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN t.called_num END 'pa_called_num', CASE t.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN t.call_len END 'pa_call_len', CASE t.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN t.call_num END 'pa_call_num', CASE t.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN t.called_num END 'zj_called_num', CASE t.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN t.call_len END 'zj_call_len', CASE t.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN t.call_num END 'zj_call_num', t.create_by, t.platform from( SELECT re.platform, re.create_by, (SELECT COUNT(1) as call_num FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT(#{date},' 09:00:00') and r.create_time <= CONCAT(#{date},' 09:59:59') and r.platform = re.platform and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.platform,r.create_by) call_num, (SELECT COUNT(1) as thcs FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT(#{date},' 09:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT(#{date},' 09:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.platform = re.platform and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.platform,r.create_by ) called_num, (SELECT sum(r.call_len) / 1000 / 60 as thsc FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT(#{date},' 09:00:00') AND r.create_time <= CONCAT(#{date},' 09:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.platform = re.platform and r.create_by = re.create_by GROUP BY r.platform,r.create_by ) call_len FROM t_lc_call_record re WHERE re.create_time >= CONCAT(#{date},' 09:00:00') and re.create_time <= CONCAT(#{date},' 09:59:59') GROUP BY re.platform,re.create_by ) t GROUP BY t.create_by,t.platform ) t,sys_user su where t.create_by = su.user_id and t.create_by != 1 and su.user_name = #{agentName} GROUP BY t.create_by UNION ALL select #{date} AS report_data, su.user_group, su.login_name, su.user_name, '10-11' as time_period, MAX(t.pa_called_num) as pa_called_num, MAX(t.pa_call_len) as pa_call_len, MAX(t.pa_call_num) as pa_call_num, MAX(t.zj_called_num) as mapper.insert:
insert into t_lc_report_personal
report_data, time_period, pa_called_num, pa_call_len, pa_call_num, zj_called_num, zj_call_len, zj_call_num, total_called_num, total_call_len, total_call_num, user_group, login_name, user_name,
#{reportData}, #{timePeriod}, #{paCalledNum}, #{paCallLen}, #{paCallNum}, #{zjCalledNum}, #{zjCallLen}, #{zjCallNum}, #{totalCalledNum}, #{totalCallLen}, #{totalCallNum}, #{userGroup}, #{loginName}, #{userName},
